title: Are you guys able to log in??
body: Just curious if you guys are able to log in.. My network is good but the page just stays "logging in", and after a while it says connection error.

replies.body: Are you still having this issue, or has it been resolved by now? If not, I recommend checking out our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues), as it covers IE Settings and a few other factors that can cause problems when logging in.

Hi, thanks for replying, I have a few friends who cant log in as well and we thought it might be the issue from the network of  the University of washington.. But the network works fine for all other things.. just not league
Holy shit, I'm at UW too. Maybe everyone who's having troubles is as well?
oh wow same. wonder what's going on.
mm. I can only play with ethernet, not wifi
I bought an ethernet adapter yesterday for this very reason haha.
Interesting. The networks may be configured differently, and because this is affecting others on campus, you may want to reach out to your network administrator about this. ^.^
